group_1.narration: The proponents of Tsuruno's Spicy Day used@the Internet to promote eating spicy food,@to enthusiastic and sometimes extreme extents,@which shook Kamihama's local social network to its core.
Because of these endeavors,@the number of supporters for Spicy Day ballooned,@but that brought its own problems.
These issues were discussed in Banbanzai,@where all of this began..

group_1.textCenter: Can I help you guys today...?

group_1.textLeft: No, we don't need anything in particular...
They're all making a big fuss over nothing...

group_1.textRight: This is why we're stuck with the status quo!

group_1.textLeft: All we have to do is follow Master Yui's teachings@and surrender to spiciness!

group_1.textRight: Wrong! You think just any kind of@spiciness is what matters!
We need to focus on the spiciness of Chinese food!

group_1.textLeft: Thinking otherwise is what's@holding back the human race!

group_1.textRight: I see what you're saying, but true spiciness lies in...

group_1.textLeft: Hmph...that's missing the point, too!@You bunch of fake spiceheads...!

group_1.textRight: You don't understand...@You guys aren't spicy...you're sweet!
We must pursue increasingly@dangerous amounts of spice!

group_1.textLeft: You guys are taking this too far!
Master Yui! This isn't the time to panic!

group_1.narration: The proponents of the Spicy Day movement splintered@into various factions including the Mainstreamers,@the Origins of Banbanzai Group, the Spice Sect,@the Spicy-Hot Extremists, and the Heartful Spiciness Society.@They became a force that could not be controlled.
I don't understand what's going on...

group_1.textCenter: (It's...not at all what I was expecting...)
(So I have to fix it somehow...)

group_1.narration: She had been sitting on a park bench,@brainstorming how she could get it all back in control...
Tsuruno was about to have a startling revelation...!
